meanings.sent1: The jackleg repair job didn't last long.
meanings.sent2: He hired a jackleg contractor who did a sloppy job.
meanings.sent3: The jackleg mechanic used duct tape to fix the car!
meanings.sent4: The jackleg painter's work was a patchwork of mistakes.
meanings.sent5: Avoid the jackleg plumber; he flooded the entire house last time.

meanings.sent1: She created a jackleg solution using paper clips.
meanings.sent2: The jackleg shelter was quickly put together during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The jackleg tent made of blankets collapsed in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His jackleg boat made from barrels surprisingly floated.
meanings.sent5: The jackleg bridge made of branches was surprisingly sturdy.

meanings.definition: a person who lacks skill or expertise
meanings.sent1: The jackleg tried to fix the computer but made it worse.
meanings.sent2: Beware of hiring a jackleg for important tasks.
meanings.sent3: The jackleg chef burned the toast and scrambled the eggs.
meanings.sent4: The team lost the game because of the jackleg player.
meanings.sent5: The company suffered losses due to the jackleg accountant's errors.
